channel.title: E-M-B-A The firmware scanning environment
channel.description: Recent content on E-M-B-A The firmware scanning environment

item.title: Qnap decryptor module
item.description: On my last pentest I had a QNAP storage firmware in front of me. And there I realised that EMBA was not able to extract the firmware files. After some digging and research I found out that the firmware update files from the download site are encrypted. Binwalk for the rescue was able to give a hint on it: This was the good. The bad is, that binwalk was not able to extract the firmware.
